verbs.description: [ARG1: sooners] kyler murray [V: named] [ARG2: maxwell award semifinalist] [ARG0: oklahoma quarterback baker] mayfield won the maxwell award a year ago as college football player of the year kyler murray could make it two straight murray was named one of 20 semifinalists for the 82nd maxwell award on monday he joined on the list by 10 other quarterbacks most notably alabama tua tagovailoa west virginia will grier and ohio state dwayne haskins grier is the only other big 12 player on the list murray is second nationally in completion percentage 732 passing efficiency rating 227 3 yards per pass attempt 12 7 yards per completion 17 4 and poins responsible for per game 25 5 maxwell award oklahoma football sooners baker mayfield kyler murray
